alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 1:13PM MST until December 12 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected before turning to a mix of snow and freezing drizzle. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...South Laramie Range including the Interstate 80 Summit between Cheyenne and Laramie. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy reductions to visibility in snow becoming more dense and widespread early Tuesday morning along roadways. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
